src:
Kingsi vezali dve pobede, Bogdan opet u crnoj zoni šuta, Beli sveprisutan (VIDEO)
Sakramento pobegao sa dna

04 Nov 2019


Druga pobeda zaredom, prva na strani - Kingsi su se pomerili s mrtve tačke!

Posle donekle potpuno neočekivanih 0-5 na startu sezone Kingsi su u Medison Skver Garden stigli po prvi brejk i uspeli da stignu do istog preko Njujok Niksa - 113:92. 
Slatka, zaslužena pobeda, ovoga puta bez drame i negativnih posledica! Kingsi su dobro iskontrolisali protivnika u prvoj četvrtini uz pravovremenu agresivnost Dearona Foksa, koji je i ovog puta bio rukovodilac igre gostiju. Jeste Foks bio nesiguran u nekoliko dobrih situacja, ali je isto tako Džulijusu Rendlu “lomio“ zglobove i Mičelu Robinsonu pravio ozbiljan problem u odbrani. Već u drugoj četvrtini počela je da se oseća razlika u kvalitetu. Kingsi su startovali serijom 11:0, dok su Nikse naterali da prve poene u periodu ubace tek posle punih pet minuta. Gosti su tada već imali zalihu od 20 poena, što je igračima Dejvida Fizdejla već bilo previše.  
Foks i Badi Hild su dobro kontrolisali igru u oba smera i uvećavali razliku kako je vreme prolazilo. Na nešto više od tri minuta pre kraja treće četvrtine otišlo se i na celih 30 poena distance (86:56) i Kingsi su pretili da ozbiljno posrame Nikse u njihovoj kući. Uz dobru odbranu Niksima je smanjen prostor za manevar, dok su na drugoj strani pljuštale trojke kao od šale. Na kraju ih je bilo 15 iz 39 pokušaja, što je i napravilo ključnu razliku na parketu.



Foks je bio najbolji igrač Kingsa s 24 poena (8/18 iz igre), uz šest asistencija, dva skoka i po jednu blokadu i ukradenu loptu. Hild je posle lošijeg izdanja protiv Jute išao do 22 poena (8/16 iz igre, 5/11 za tri), uz četiri skoka i po jednu asistenciju, ukradenu i blokiranu loptu. I jedno vrlo atraktivno zakucavanje. Pogledajte i sami... 



Harison Barns ponovo je bio džoker Kingsa u obe faze i ovog puta imao je 19 poena, četiri uhvaćene i jednu ukradenu loptu. Nemanja Bjelica je protekle večeri radio apsolutno sve na parketu. Baš kao i protiv Jute. Imao je na kraju 10 poena (4/5 iz igre), osam skokova, šest asistencija i jednu ukradenu loptu. Bogdan Bogdanović opet nije blistao kako ume. Za 19 minuta u igri ubacio je svega šest poena, oba posle šuteva za tri poena (2/7) i imao je svega još jedan pokušaj za dva poena. Na to je dopisao po tri skoka i asistencije, uz jednu ukradenu loptu.



U redovima Niksa Markus Moris je ubacio 28, a Ar Džej Beret 22 poena.




NBA – rezultati

Indijana – Čikago 108:95/Voren 26 – Levin 21/
Majami – Hjuston 129:100/Robinson 23 – Harden 29/
Njujork – Sakramento 92:113/Moris 28 – Foks 24/
San Antonio – LA Lejkers 96:103/Mari 18 – Dejvis 25/
Klivlend – Dalas 111:131/Lav 29 – Dončić 29/
LA Klipers – Juta 105:94/Leonard 30 – Mičel 36/

text:
Kings tie for two wins, Bogdan again in Black shot zone, White ubiquitous (VIDEO)
Sacramento escaped from the bottom

04 Nov 2019


Second win in a row, first on the sidelines - the Kings have moved from a blind spot!

After a somewhat unexpected 0-5 start to the season, the Kings made their first break at Madison Square Garden and managed to make it through the New York Knicks - 113: 92.
Sweet, well deserved victory, this time without drama and negative consequences! The Kings controlled the opponent well in the first quarter with the timely aggression of Deron Fox, who was the game manager for the visitors this time. Fox was unsure of a few good situations, but he also broke Julius Randle's wrists and gave Mitchell Robinson a serious defense problem. As early as the second quarter, a difference in quality began to be felt. The Kings started the series with 11-0, while the Knicks forced the first points of the period to score after only five minutes. The guests already had 20 points to spare, which was too much for David Fizdale's players.
Fox and Buddy Hild controlled the game well in both directions and magnified the difference as time went on. Just over three minutes before the end of the third quarter, the whole 30 points (86:56) went off and the Kings threatened to embarrass the Knicks in their home. With good defense, the Knicks reduced the maneuvering space, while on the other side, threesomes spat like a joke. In the end, there were 15 of 39 attempts, which made a key difference on the flooring.



Fox was the Kings' best player with 24 points (8/18 from the game), with six assists, two rebounds and one block each and a steal. Hilda went up to 22 points (8/16 from play, 5/11 for three) after a worse run against Utah, with four rebounds and one assist, a steal and a blocked ball. And one very attractive dunk. See for yourself ...



Harrison Barnes was the Kings wildcard again in both phases and this time he had 19 points, four catches and one steal. Last night, Nemanja Bjelica did absolutely everything on the floor. Just like against Utah. He had 10 points (4/5 from the game), eight rebounds, six assists and one steal in the end. Bogdan Bogdanovic again did not shine as he could. He scored just six points in the game 19 minutes, both after three-point shots (2/7) and had just one more two-point attempt. He added three rebounds and assists with one steal.



In the Knicks, Markus Morris scored 28 and Ar Jay Beret 22 points.




NBA - Results

Indiana - Chicago 108: 95 / Warren 26 - Levin 21 /
Miami - Houston 129: 100 / Robinson 23 - Harden 29 /
New York - Sacramento 92: 113 / Morris 28 - Fox 24 /
San Antonio - LA Lakers 96: 103 / Mar 18 - Davis 25 /
Cleveland - Dallas 111: 131 / Leo 29 - Doncic 29 /
LA Clippers - Utah 105: 94 / Leonard 30 - Mitchell 36 /
